branding.tagline: Crafting the old into something boldly new!

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Vintage patterns, beginner guides, and modern adaptations in knitting, sewing, quilting, and needlework.
publishing_focus.target_audience: Young adults, DIY enthusiasts, vintage and modern craft lovers.
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our blend of traditional and modern patterns, as well as approachable guides, appeal to a wide range of crafters.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Reviving Vintage Knitting Patterns, Modern Quilting: A Beginner's Guide, author types like young craft influencers, vintage pattern collectors
